abstracts.cdata!:
Project outcome is rated satisfactory
            and project sustainability is likely. world Bank performance
            is satisfactory based on the ratings for lending and
            outcomes. Borrower performance is satisfactory based on the
            ratings of project preparation, implementation, and
            outcomes. Lessons learned include the following points:
            Programmatic adjustment lending to selected states of India
            can be an effective instrument for supporting fiscal reforms
            at the state level. When policy formulation and reform
            implementation capacity is weak, as in the case of Uttar
            Pradesh, a more strategic design can lead to a more focused
            but deeper dialogue. Detailed listing and auditing of a
            subset of line items within the expenditure budget,
            identified as High Priority Development Expenditures, tends
            to create a "budget within a budget"--a better
            approach would encourage reprioritization within the budget,
            in the context of an improved budget process, while avoiding
            micro-management. In establishing an effective poverty and
            social monitoring system, emphasis should be placed from the
            outset on a) institutionalizing a system of periodic
            collection and analysis of data; and b) fostering demand for
            the use of such data, both within and outside the government.
